name: Dreaming False Memories
description:
Syoudre here, this is my secondary public script made on Danmakufu, unlike my previous one, I'm using the ph3sx version by Natashi, I hope you enjoy this game, it's not long as your usual touhou games, this is mostly just a boss rush of sorts, the story and the character set is based on Urban Legend in Limbo, so minor spoilers for that. This script also has spoilers in Antinomy of Common Flowers, so if you haven't played the game or you don't care, then have a good time!

//--------------Credits--------------//

Dreaming False Memories

A Touhou Project fan-made script

By Syoudre

Discord: Syoudre#8210
